body_html: As commented on the forums, I think the main thing going on here is that symeig is called without eigenvectors=True and returns funny stuff. Maybe we should add a Python wrapper returning just the eigenvalues in the eigenvectors=False case.
body_text: As commented on the forums, I think the main thing going on here is that symeig is called without eigenvectors=True and returns funny stuff. Maybe we should add a Python wrapper returning just the eigenvalues in the eigenvectors=False case.
body: As commented on the forums, I think the main thing going on here is that symeig is called without `eigenvectors=True` and returns funny stuff. Maybe we should add a Python wrapper returning just the eigenvalues in the eigenvectors=False case.
